Odeinoichus,"2010-11-29T23:10:49.747Z","Time for your shots.","

Set #8683 Nurse: I wound up picking up two of this figure and I'm really glad that I did, every LEGO City can use a few nurses to staff the Hospital. She comes with a clip-board printed plate and two syringes, so I have four in total, and she looks very nice with her Nurse Uniform printing.

I'd have to say out of all of Series 1 this is one figure you can't do without, especially if you want to populate your LEGO City with some much needed medical professionals to help out all of the patients that show up at the LEGO City Hospital.

",TRUE,5,3,1,5,5

AETerry,"2011-04-18T22:56:09.327Z","Nurse Review","

As I missed all of Series 1, I've started placing orders for them from sites offering a specific minifig, a little bit more then if I'd been able to buy them randomly, but still worth the money if they're not to highly priced.

The Nurse figure works out as a much needed minifigure, not just for the Collecters, but those building MOCs and creating their own Lego Towns/Cities. If you can get more then one, so much the better as you can then switch out hair and head pieces to create different nurses.

The quality of plastic doesn't seem to match up to the quality of plastic used in later series of Minifigures. There's a definent texture feel for how ""strong"" the plastic is. What's great is the hair piece, introduced with this minifigure, the syringe (you get 2) and the tile piece that's got a print on it for a patient's records. The print piece on the torso is also great, I'd almost make her the Doctor and the other medical minifigures I have nurses as their prints don't look as nice, even with taking consideration their age.

She was worth getting, even if a bit extra after a series is gone.

",TRUE,4,4,1,5,4

sideswinger,"2020-07-25T16:06:17.11Z","An EXCELLENT figure!","

I just love how it came out, with those measuring lines on it, as well as the two handles on it, which is awesome. And it is caste in gray as well, which is a color I haven&#39

column1: And my overall opinion for this is great, because this is a great figure. I just really love how she came out, for a lot of
